RNS Number : 0034PAVEVA Group PLC12 February 2021

AVEVA Group plc

Director/PDMR Shareholding/PCA Shareholding

AVEVA Group plc announces that on 12 February 2021 it was notified of the following sales of shares which took place:

David Ward, Finance Director and Company Secretary

On 11 February 2021 Mr Ward sold 1,443 ordinary shares at a price of £37.88 per share and Joanne Ward, wife of and person closely associated with Mr Ward, sold a total of 2,591 ordinary shares at a price of £37.67 per share.

Enquiries:

AVEVA Group plc

Claire Denton, Group General Counsel and Deputy Company Secretary
